 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (MetadataEditor)

Detailed Description

MetadataEditor used to modify metadata in a RemoteControlClient object.

Use

See also:
"RemoteControlClient#editMetadata(boolean)"/> to create an instance of an editor, on which you set the metadata for the RemoteControlClient instance. Once all the information has been set, use
"#apply()"/> to make it the new metadata that should be displayed for the associated client. Once the metadata has been "applied", you cannot reuse this instance of the MetadataEditor.

Definition at line 447 of file RemoteControlClient.h.

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::media::MetadataEditor::apply ( )

Associates all the metadata that has been set since the MetadataEditor instance was created with.

See also:
RemoteControlClient::editMetadata(boolean), or since
clear() was called, with the RemoteControlClient. Once "applied", this MetadataEditor cannot be reused to edit the RemoteControlClient's metadata.
void gaia::media::MetadataEditor::clear ( )

Clears all the metadata that has been set since the MetadataEditor instance was created with.

See also:
"RemoteControlClient#editMetadata(boolean)"/>.

See also:
BITMAP_KEY_ARTWORK
Parameters:

int64_t  value 
)

Adds numerical information to be displayed.

Note that none of the information added after

See also:
"#apply()"/> has been called, will be displayed.
Parameters:
keythe identifier of a the metadata field to set. Valid values are
See also:
gaia::media::MediaMetadataRetriever::METADATA_KEY_CD_TRACK_NUMBER,
gaia::media::MediaMetadataRetriever::METADATA_KEY_DISC_NUMBER,
gaia::media::MediaMetadataRetriever::METADATA_KEY_DURATION (with a value expressed in milliseconds),
gaia::media::MediaMetadataRetriever::METADATA_KEY_YEAR.
Parameters:
valueThe long value for the given key
Returns:
Returns a reference to the same MetadataEditor object, so you can chain put calls together.
